title: Live updates: Israel-Hezbollah cease-fire begins, halting war in Lebanon
body: A U.S.-backed cease-fire agreement between Israel and Hezbollah went into effect at 4 a.m. local time Wednesday, halting the deadliest war in Lebanon in decades. Fighting continued up to the 11th

title: Giant Panda Learns to Play the Harmonica
body: Mei Xiang, a resident of the National Zoo, surprised onlookers yesterday by mastering the harmonica.  Zookeepers believe she learned by mimicking a nearby street musician.

title: The Journalist and the Olive Tree
body: Amidst the rubble of Beirut, a young journalist named Layla found a single olive tree still standing, its branches laden with fruit.  The tree, a symbol of resilience, reminded her of the stories she had been reporting â€“ stories of loss, but also of unexpected hope.  As the cease-fire held, Layla sat beneath the tree, sketching its silhouette, a quiet moment of peace in a city still recovering from war.
